AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pollen gatherer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an agricultural buff, rather common amongst the Apini. Pollen gathering is an essential job, for without honey the hive will starve through winter

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: BuzzArtist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an entrepreneur in what humans called confectionery. [PAWN_pronoun] had experimented in making many tasty honey based creations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Busybody
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always works tirelessly and hastily to expand and decorate the hive. [PAWN_pronoun] had to do [PAWN_possessive] job so fast that [PAWN_pronoun] never even had time to look at the sky.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wasp wannabee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: “Bees are, like totally boring”, “I wish mom hadn’t been a fat slob who killed dad”, “It’s not a phase, guys! Whatever, I’m going with the Hornets” are many a phrase [PAWN_nameDef] uttered in adolescence. \n [PAWN_nameDef] stuck by these thoughts for the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life, finding [PAWN_possessive]self outcast for [PAWN_possessive]… alternative thinking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: B-lazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] likes fire. [PAWN_pronoun] likes it a lot. Where most avoid the smoke and heat, [PAWN_nameDef] is drawn to the substance, seeing it as a way of expressing [PAWN_possessive] lust for power and individual freedom.\n By Apini standards, [PAWN_pronoun] is the equivalent of the most despicable human sociopath.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Layabout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In search of an easy life, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] life avoiding the hard work in the hive, so much so that one day [PAWN_pronoun] was noticed and banished.\n [PAWN_pronoun] lived the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life in a improvised house bothering anyone [PAWN_pronoun] met for any easy job.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] went out often and traded goods from the hive. [PAWN_pronoun] became good at negotiating with others and handling the animals, but wasn't taught much in the way of menial skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alpaca shepherd
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always had a fascination with the fluffy Alpaca, curiosity turned into an unhealthy obsession and after a rather embarrassing incident, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of the colony.\nOut to start anew, bringing with [PAWN_possessive] [PAWN_possessive] love for the fluffiest of creatures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hive protector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As an adult, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with guarding the hive against Azuri swarms. [PAWN_nameDef] had to rely on other Apini to make sure [PAWN_pronoun] stayed supplied so [PAWN_pronoun] could dedicate all [PAWN_possessive] time to [PAWN_possessive] vigilance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wax sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always felt using wax for petty things like 'walls' and 'floors' was a great waste of beesources. Due to this, [PAWN_nameDef] begun to capture beeutiful bee figures and craft unbeleevably opulent wares.\nUnfortunately, much to [PAWN_possessive] hive's disdain and concern, [PAWN_nameDef] became something of a recluse and a wax thief. [PAWN_possessive] beehavior was reluctantly tolerated by the rest of the hive - if only because of the art's value to exotic trade.
